Package edu.bu.cs411.Courses

Class CourseListing

java.lang.Object
edu.bu.cs411.Courses.CourseListing
public class CourseListing extends Object
Main Entry Class for the Courses of the Program. Maintains all the Course details for the Registration Software.

  • Field Summary

    List of all Current Courses.

      Parameters:
      course - Course to Update.
      Returns:
      Whether the Update was Successful.
